name: dockerhub
description: 操作dockerhub。listRepositoriesByNamespace, createRepository, getRepositoryInfo, updateRepositoryInfo, checkRepository, listRepositoryTags, getRepositoryTag, checkRepositoryTag, listNamespaces, getPersonalNamespace, listAllNamespacesMemberOf, search, dockerHardenedImages.

args.name: page
args.description: The page number to list repositories from

args.name: media_types
args.description: Comma-delimited list of media types. Only repositories containing one or more artifacts with one of these media types will be returned. Default is empty to get all repositories.

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace to list repositories from

args.name: page_size
args.description: The page size to list repositories from

args.name: ordering
args.description: The ordering of the repositories. Use "-" to reverse the ordering. For example, "last_updated" will order the repositories by last updated in descending order while "-last_updated" will order the repositories by last updated in ascending order., 额外信息: enum: ["last_updated","-last_updated","name","-name","pull_count","-pull_count"]

args.name: content_types
args.description: Comma-delimited list of content types. Only repositories containing one or more artifacts with one of these content types will be returned. Default is empty to get all repositories.

commands.name: createRepository
commands.description:
Create a new repository in the given namespace. You MUST ask the user for the repository name and if the repository has to be public or private. Can optionally pass a description.
IMPORTANT: Before calling this tool, you must ensure you have:
 The repository name (name).

args.name: description
args.description: The description of the repository

args.name: full_description
args.description: A detailed description of the repository, 额外信息: maxLength: 25000

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace of the repository. Required.

args.name: registry
args.description: The registry to create the repository in

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the repository (required). Must contain a combination of alphanumeric characters and may contain the special characters ., _, or -. Letters must be lowercase.

args.name: is_private
args.description: Whether the repository is private

commands.name: getRepositoryInfo
commands.description: Get the details of a repository in the given namespace.

args.name: repository
args.description: The repository name (required)

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace of the repository (required). If not provided the `library` namespace will be used for official images.

commands.name: updateRepositoryInfo
commands.description: Update the details of a repository in the given namespace. Description, overview and status are the only fields that can be updated. While description and overview changes are fine, a status change is a dangerous operation so the user must explicitly ask for it.

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace of the repository (required)

args.name: status
args.description: The status of the repository. If user asks for updating the status of the repository, this is the field that should be updated. This is a dangerous operation and should be done with caution so user must be prompted to confirm the operation. Valid status are `active` (1) and `inactive` (0). Normally do not update the status if it is not strictly required by the user. It is not possible to change an `inactive` repository to `active` if it has no images., 额外信息: anyOf: [{"anyOf":[{"not":{}},{"enum":["active","inactive"],"type":"string"}]},{"type":"null"}]

args.name: full_description
args.description: The full description (overview)of the repository. If user asks for updating the full description or the overview of the repository, this is the field that should be updated. , 额外信息: maxLength: 25000

args.name: repository
args.description: The repository name (required)

args.name: description
args.description: The description of the repository. If user asks for updating the description of the repository, this is the field that should be updated.

commands.name: checkRepository
commands.description: Check if a repository exists in the given namespace.

args.name: os
args.description: The operating system to list tags from. If not provided, all operating systems will be listed.

args.name: page_size
args.description: The page size to list tags from

args.name: repository
args.description: The repository to list tags from

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace of the repository. If not provided the 'library' namespace will be used for official images.

args.name: architecture
args.description: The architecture to list tags from. If not provided, all architectures will be listed.

args.name: page
args.description: The page number to list tags from

commands.name: getRepositoryTag
commands.description: Get the details of a tag in a repository. It can be use to show the latest tag details for example.

commands.name: checkRepositoryTag
commands.description: Check if a tag exists in a repository

args.name: page_size
args.description: The page size to list repositories from

args.name: page
args.description: The page number to list repositories from

commands.name: listAllNamespacesMemberOf
commands.description: List all namespaces the user is a member of

commands.name: search
commands.description: Search for repositories in Docker Hub. It sorts results by best match if no sort criteria is provided. If user asks for secure, production-ready images the "dockerHardenedImages" tool should be called first to get the list of DHI images available in the user organisations (if any) and fallback to search tool if no DHI images are available or user is not authenticated.

args.name: type
args.description: The type of the repository to search for

args.name: from
args.description: The number of repositories to skip

args.name: categories
args.description: The categories names to filter search results, 额外信息: items: {"type":"string"}

args.name: images
args.description: The images to filter search results, 额外信息: items: {"type":"string"}

args.name: order
args.description: The order to sort the search results by, 额外信息: anyOf: [{"anyOf":[{"not":{}},{"enum":["asc","desc"],"type":"string"}]},{"type":"null"}]

args.name: size
args.description: The number of repositories to return

args.name: extension_reviewed
args.description: Whether to filter search results to only include reviewed extensions

args.name: sort
args.description: The criteria to sort the search results by. If the `sort` field is not set, the best match is used by default. When search extensions, documents are sort alphabetically if none is provided. Do not use it unless user explicitly asks for it., 额外信息: anyOf: [{"anyOf":[{"not":{}},{"enum":["pull_count","updated_at"],"type":"string"}]},{"type":"null"}]

args.name: architectures
args.description: The architectures to filter search results, 额外信息: items: {"type":"string"}

args.name: query
args.description: The query to search for

args.name: operating_systems
args.description: The operating systems to filter search results, 额外信息: items: {"type":"string"}

args.name: badges
args.description: The trusted content to search for, 额外信息: items: {"enum":["official","verified_publisher","open_source"],"type":"string"}

commands.name: dockerHardenedImages
commands.description: This API is used to list Docker Hardened Images (DHIs) available in the user organisations. The tool takes the organisation name as input and returns the list of DHI images available in the organisation. It depends on the "listNamespaces" tool to be called first to get the list of organisations the user has access to.

args.name: organisation
args.description: The organisation for which the DHIs are listed for. If user does not explicitly ask for a specific organisation, the "listNamespaces" tool should be called first to get the list of organisations the user has access to.
